channel.title: Converting Weapon From Melee To Range
channel.description: Alright This is going to sound complicated but i added the sniper rifle custom item i was wondering if there is a possible way to make the item shoot projectiles? and change it to a range based weapon if there is any possible way please get back to me

item.title: Converting Weapon From Melee To Range
item.dc:creator: @TheJoker619 TheJoker619
item.description:
@TheJoker619 wrote:

I guess you could change the sprite of a bow that is if your custom item has all the right graphics and angles and then rename it to Sniper Rifle.

Read full topic
item.source: Converting Weapon From Melee To Range

OMG I lol’d so hard at this…

I wasn’t looking for crap on my thread i wanted answers i may not be a good programmer but at least i have the common sense to not laugh at people’s threads if it is a legitimate question

[quote author=Natey link=topic=385325.msg2889709#msg2889709 date=1248819130]

OMG I lol’d so hard at this…
[/quote]Coming from the noob.
And I don’t think you can, I don’t do models usally.
[/quote] And Thanks thats all i needed to know.

[/quote]No problem, ask SilentCj hw can answer that for you :P[/quote]
Thanks.
